arts.ttl: Wout Weghorst slammed for celebrating goal after Hungary coach collapsed on touchline
arts.sum: Wout Weghorst scored the Netherlands' first goal in their UEFA Nations League win over Hungary but the match was earlier stopped as Hungary coach Adam Szalai was hospitalised

arts.ttl: Hungary asst. 'stable' after falling ill vs. Dutch
arts.sum: Hungary assistant coach Adam Szalai was in "stable" condition after he was evacuated from the Nations League game against the Netherlands, the Hungarian Football Federation said on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Nations League: Hungary coach Adam Szalai stable after being taken ill
arts.sum: Szalai taken to hospital during defeat by Netherlands Hungarian football federation say he is conscious The Hungary head coach, Adam Szalai, was said to be in a stable condition after being taken ill at the start of his side’s Nations League loss to the Netherlands, the country’s football federation has said. Szalai, 36, was taken to an Amsterdam hospital for an examination. “Adam Szalai fell ill in the first minutes of the Netherlands-Hungary match, but his condition is stable and he is conscious,” a statement from the Hungarian Football Federation said. “He was transported by ambulance to an Amsterdam hospital for examination.” Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Netherlands Player Ratings in victory over Hungary
arts.sum: The Netherlands ran out 4-0 winners over Hungary on Saturday and below we provide our player ratings for the Oranje stars. Bart Verbruggen 7/10: He kept the Netherlands level in the early stages but after Oranje gained control he had very little to do. Denzel Dumfries 7.5/10: A quiet first half but in the second […] The post Netherlands Player Ratings in victory over Hungary appeared first on Football Oranje.

arts.ttl: Netherlands 4-0 Hungary: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Ronald Koeman's side advance to quarter-finals of UEFA Nations League
arts.sum: Netherlands book their spot in the quarter-finals of the 2024-25 UEFA Nations League courtesy of a 4-0 victory over Hungary on Saturday night.

arts.ttl: Netherlands vs Hungary halted due to medical emergency as Magyars relive Euro 2024 Scotland scare
arts.sum: It comes just months after Barnabas Varga suffered a sickening head injury against Scotland in a similar stoppage

arts.ttl: Dominik Szoboszlai in tears as Hungary vs Netherlands stopped due to medical emergency
arts.sum: Hungary's UEFA Nations League clash with Netherlands on Thursday evening was stopped due to a medical emergency on the Hungarian bench

arts.ttl: Report: Liverpool could have to pay £80m to sign Virgil van Dijk’s replacement, he’s ‘a modern-day centre-back’

arts.ttl: Koeman leaves Zirkzee and Kluivert out of Oranje selection
arts.sum: Reports from Voetbal International have revealed that Dutch national coach Ronald Koeman has decided not to include Joshua Zirkzee and Justin Kluivert for the Nations League match against Hungary. It…
